item.title: Nobuaki Kobayashi Decides Against Making Mt Gox Bitcoin Addresses Public - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Nobuaki Kobayashi Decides Against Making Mt Gox Bitcoin Addresses Public - NEWSBTC

The wallet addresses belonging to Mt Gox will not be made public, said the court-appointed trustee in today's statement. Read more... If there is one incident which the bitcoin community is forced to revisit occasionally, then Mt Gox takes the cake.

item.title: Proposed Hard-Fork to Nullify ASICBoost Patent - Bitcoinist.net
item.description:
Proposed Hard-Fork to Nullify ASICBoost Patent - Bitcoinist.net

Bitcoin Core contributor, Peter Todd, announced that a hard-fork had been proposed to negate attempts to patent the Also read: Kraken Launches ETH Dark Pool Trading ASICBoost method. According to a message by Peter, this proposed idea sprang from an agreement made at a Bitcoin-oriented round-table in February.

item.title: Bitcoin.com Partner With SoftSwiss to Launch Digital Currency Casino
item.description:
Bitcoin.com Partner With SoftSwiss to Launch Digital Currency Casino

SoftSwiss, a white label online casino platform developer, announced today a white label partnership with Bitcoin.com, currently owned by famed Bitcoin investor Roger Ver. Ver was involved in the early-stage funding of several prominent digital currency firms such as Kraken, Bockchcain.info and BitPay.

item.title: Germany had so much renewable energy on Sunday that it had to pay people to use electricity
item.description:
Germany had so much renewable energy on Sunday that it had to pay people to use electricity

On Sunday, May 8, Germany hit a new high in renewable energy generation. Thanks to a sunny and windy day, at one point around 1pm the country's solar, wind, hydro and biomass plants were supplying about 55 GW of the 63 GW being consumed, or 87%.

item.title: Four Genuine Blockchain Use Cases - CoinDesk
item.description:
Four Genuine Blockchain Use Cases - CoinDesk

Dr Gideon Greenspan is the founder and CEO of Coin Sciences, the company behind the MultiChain platform for private blockchains. In this opinion piece, Greenspan outlines four use cases for permissioned blockchains, arguing that financial institutions may face more limitations in trying to harness the technology than previously thought.

item.title: Swiss town to start accepting bitcoin payments
item.description:
Swiss town to start accepting bitcoin payments

GENEVA - A Swiss town that is billing itself as a hub for the digital currency industry will accept bitcoin for some payments starting this summer, in what proponents call a worldwide first by a government body and a sign that "crypto finance" is growing in legitimacy.

item.title: Bitcoin, the trust chain that banks and governments cannot corrupt | HolyTransaction
item.description:
Bitcoin, the trust chain that banks and governments cannot corrupt | HolyTransaction

For centuries the use of money evolved according to available technologies and society needs. Bitcoin is a currency and each currency is information. The information must be exchanged, only this way it can be recognized and associated with a value, especially in today's world drawn as a network.

item.title: Bitcoin Weekly 2016 May 11: OpenBazaar 1.1.5, Bitbank Chinese mine, Gemini adds Ethereum trading
item.description:
Bitcoin Weekly 2016 May 11: OpenBazaar 1.1.5, Bitbank Chinese mine, Gemini adds Ethereum trading

Peer-to-peer marketplace OpenBazaar continues to develop apace with the release of version 1.1.5, which adds e-mail notifications, easy server switching, CSV data export and improved listing information. The BBC published a report about a giant Bitcoin mining facility located in a remote Chinese village with an interesting 360-degree video.

item.title: Former CFTC Commissioner States Obama "Should Heed the Call" on Bitcoin
item.description:
Former CFTC Commissioner States Obama "Should Heed the Call" on Bitcoin

Former commissioner on the Commodity Futures Trading Commission advised Obama in an op-ed on CNBC today to take a reasonable approach to digital currency and blockchain technology, one that fosters innovation. Bitcoin and blockchain regulation has been a hot topic at conferences and on the nascent technology's online forums. Bitcoin, known for its anarchist and libertarian leanings, fear government legislators and regulators.

item.title: Talking Crix with Founder Dmitry Koval - Bitcoinist.net
item.description:
Talking Crix with Founder Dmitry Koval - Bitcoinist.net

Disclaimer: This article was provided by the Vanbex Group. Bitcoinist is not affiliated with the firms represented by the Vanbex Group and is not responsible for their products and/or servces. "Our mission," said Koval, "is to contribute to the community and ecosystem by creating the best niche products such as exchange-traded futures contracts suitable for hedging and high-leveraged trading."
